# chamferResolution

**Instance Property**

Resolution of the chamfer curve.

## Declaration

```swift
var chamferResolution: MeshResource.ShapeExtrusionOptions.CurveStrokeResolution
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MeshResource/ShapeExtrusionOptions/CurveStrokeResolution/uniformSegmentsPerSpan(segmentCount:)] with a segment count of 8.
